lead_paragraph: Brazilian police broke up a black-market ring that tried to illegally sell over 700 Olympic tickets at exorbitant prices, authorities said Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Brazil Police Bust Black-Market Ticket Ring for Rio Olympics
headline.main: Brazil Police Bust Black-Market Ticket Ring for Rio Olympics

snippet: Brazilian police broke up a black-market ring that tried to illegally sell over 700 Olympic tickets at exorbitant prices, authorities said Tuesday....
